Text:
A good English version at last! Great rip and surprisingly fast download. 
A:10
V:10
Many thanks!

Very fast download, however I was experiencing jerking images. 'Lag', though it wasn't my PC. I am using VLC. I converted it to MP4 and the jerks were still present in the same exact moments. Anyone else have this issue? Otherwise... FINALLY!
A:10
V:10

And those of you who ask if this is real DTS or if it's the regular 'crap', that's been floating around. I don't have software to determine if it is DTS but I know it's not that floating crap. This is legitimate. I re-downloaded the first 20 seconds and the jerks are still there.
Agreed with darkie00, jerky image. Didn't get encoded correctly. Don't waste your time. :
